page.title: 20SPORT & LEISURE IN SKEGNESS
page.content: Skegness does not have a sport or leisure centre although the residents have been asking for one for many years.We do have a very good outdoor swimming pool but this has problems. The pool loses money even in the summer time because the staff have to be paid even if the pool is not busy. The pool closes in the winter time and so the residents must travel 23 miles to Louth or Boston to swim.In 1983 the Embassy Centre was opened.This is a conference and theatre centre.It attracts money to the town by attracting business conferences.It also stages shows during the summer.In this way it provides some necessary facilities.However many residents feel that the money used to build the Embassy should have been put towards a sports and leisure centre for the town.
